alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Putnam; Smith (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:53PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Smith, southern Jackson and west central Putnam Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 553 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Carthage, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carthage, Gainesboro, Baxter, Gordonsville, Hickman, South Carthage and Granville. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 256 and 268, and between mile markers 277 and 282. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
